https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/zhw0Q6u8OLJ4Mrc3DgfKdbsQflF.jpg Avan Chandiyude Makan is a 2007 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Thulasidas. The film stars Prithviraj Sukumaran, Vijayaraghavan and Vakkom Jayalal in lead roles. The film had musical score by Sanjeev Lal. Avan Chandiyude makan
